user_query: I am conducting a research project and require the basic daily zip files of filed 10-q and 10-k reports. Can you provide me with the basic daily data for the date '2022-11-10'? Furthermore, I would like to check the availability of dates for both basic and premium subscriptions using the content endpoint. Could you also provide the server time using the heartbeat endpoint?

TaskList.description: Retrieve the basic daily zip files of filed 10-q and 10-k reports for the date '2022-11-10'.
Check the availability of dates for both basic and premium subscriptions using the content endpoint.
Get the server time using the heartbeat endpoint.
